column2:
mapdeck(token = key, style = mapdeck_style("dark")) %>% 
  add_animated_arc(
    data = movement_data, 
    origin = c("start_long", "start_lat"),
    destination = c("end_long", "end_lat"),
    tooltip = "individual_local_identifier",
    stroke_from = "individual_local_identifier",
    stroke_to = "individual_local_identifier",
    layer_id = 'arclayer'
      )
animated_arc is an experimental layer and the function may change without warning
